attributes.action: Stop Liz Truss from threating the future of young transgender individuals
attributes.additional_details:
Based upon:
https://www.change.org/p/uk-parliament-liz-truss-threatens-the-future-of-young-transgender-individuals-this-needs-to-be-stopped

The petition is here for the UK people to make parliament discuss this concern.

Additional reading:
https://www.pinknews.co.uk/2020/04/24/liz-truss-healthcare-trans-youth-women-equalities-gender-recognition-act-protest-backlash/

https://www.pinknews.co.uk/2020/04/23/liz-truss-trans-rights-gender-recognition-act-reform-healthcare-puberty-blockers-backlash/
attributes.background:
Truss has hinted towards a harmful relook into how transgender people are handled in the NHS and whether treatment should be given to under 18s.
Whether or not you are a part of the LGBTQ+ community, we ask you to please help us to stand and fight against this before it is looked at in the summer.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not ban gender transition treatments for under 18s: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318025

Uphold current legal protections for transgender individuals and under 18s: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318175
